name: Next Up Hero
description: Fight. Die. Win! (And probably die some more.) There are no health kits. Sorry!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 (3.4 GHz) or AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6850 / NVIDIA GeForce 650 / Intel Iris Pro 5200 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 1 GB VRAM; Windows 8 & 8.1 are unsupported
